data.text: Anisoadehu a Awurade Nyankopɔn daa no adi faa Edom asase ho kyerɛɛ Obadia ni:
Awurade ka kyerɛ Edom se:
Wayɛ ahantan adaadaa wo ho,
Sɛ wutu kɔ wim sɛ akɔre,1.4 Ɔkɔre. Anomaa a obu ne ho sɛ ɔhene na ɔwɔ ahoɔden a otumi de tu kɔ akyirikyiri na otumi hu ade kann nso. (5 Mose 28.49; Yes 40.31; Yer 4.13; 49.22; Hes 17.3).
“Sɛ akorɔmfo ba wo so,
Na wo Esau de, wobewia wʼademude
Wɔn a wo ne wɔn wɔ nkabom nyinaa
“Saa da no,” Awurade na ose,

Teman1.9 Teman: Teman kyerɛ Edom nyinaa sɛnea Yeremia ka wɔ 49.7, 20. Teman nkyerɛase yɛ “anafo.” Saa din yi tumi yɛ Edom a ɛyɛ anafo asase. Ebinom nso kyerɛ Teman ase se Tawilan a ɛda borɔfokwansin abiɛsa wɔ Petra apuei fam. wʼakofo bɛbɔ hu
Esiane basabasayɛ a woyɛ tiaa wo nua Yakob no nti
Da a wugyinaa ntentenso hwɛɛ no haa,
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wubu wo nua animtiaa
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wode nsrabɔ
Anka ɛnsɛ sɛ wotɛw wɔn nkwantanan so
“Awurade da no abɛn
Sɛnea mononom nsã wɔ me bepɔw kronkron so no,
Na ogye bɛba Sion bepɔw so
Yakob bɛyɛ ogya
Nkurɔfo a wofi Negeb no
Nnipakuw yi a wɔyɛ Israelfo a wotwaa wɔn asu kɔɔ Kanaan no
Agyefo bɛkɔ Sion bepɔw so,
